title: Looking for graded Polar Bear backs
author: johnjohnny

posts.post_title: Looking for graded Polar Bear backs
posts.post_content:
Hello All

I am just getting into vintage and would like to get polar bear backs T206, preferably graded but possibly raw. Ill take whatever I can get from commons to stars. Not looking for anything crazy right now. Nothing over $300 unless its some kind of firesale card. Cheap lots would be awesome.

Thanks guys.  PSA GRADED PLEASE

I have Christy matthewson- dark cap Psa 3.
